name: Morgan Reed
summary: Computer science graduate with hands-on experience in full-stack development, data pipelines, and cloud infrastructure. Keen on building reliable systems and clear APIs. Comfortable owning features from design to deployment.

education.degree: B.Sc. in Computer Science, First Class Honours

researchexperience.title: ML Research Intern
bullets: Worked on time-series forecasting for energy demand; improved baseline MAE by 18% using attention-based encoders.
Prepared and documented two benchmark datasets for public release; wrote reproducibility scripts and docs.
Contributed to a workshop paper on evaluation pitfalls in long-horizon forecasting (accepted).

researchexperience.title: Graduate Researcher
bullets: Designed and ran experiments for a recommendation system study; compared collaborative filtering vs. content-based methods.
Built a small evaluation harness and logging pipeline for A/B-style metrics used in the lab.
Supported the research lead with literature review and figure generation for a journal submission.

industryexperience.title: Backend Engineer Intern
bullets: Implement and maintain REST and gRPC services in Go; own parts of the billing and usage-reporting APIs.
Add and tune Prometheus metrics and Grafana dashboards for core services; reduced MTTR for two recurring incidents.
Participate in on-call rotation and post-incident reviews; document runbooks for new endpoints.

industryexperience.title: Software Developer Intern
bullets: Developed ETL jobs in Python and Spark to ingest and normalize event data from multiple sources.
Wrote unit and integration tests for new pipelines; set up basic CI checks in the team repo.
Delivered a short internal demo on data quality checks and alerting; received positive feedback from stakeholders.

industryexperience.title: Full-Stack Intern
bullets: Built customer-facing dashboards and admin tools using React and Node.js; integrated with existing auth and APIs.
Improved page load times by lazy-loading heavy components and adding a simple caching layer.
Collaborated with design and product on specs and acceptance criteria for two sprint deliverables.

publications.title: Long-Horizon Forecasting: Pitfalls and Practical Fixes
bullets: Empirical study on common evaluation mistakes in long-horizon time-series; proposed simple corrections that reduced reported error inflation in three public benchmarks.

projects.name: EventStream
projects.description: Personal side project — event ingestion and replay
bullets: Small service that accepts webhook events, stores them in PostgreSQL, and replays them on demand with idempotency keys.
Implemented in Go with Docker; added a minimal React UI for browsing and filtering events.
Used as a reference implementation in a blog post and for learning event-sourcing concepts.

projects.name: DashKit
bullets: Library of React components (charts, tables, filters) with a small design system; used in two course projects.
Documented usage and examples in Storybook; published as a private npm package for the team.

honorsawards.title: LaunchPad Studios Intern of the Quarter
bullets: Awarded for timely delivery of dashboard features and proactive collaboration with design and product.

volunteering.title: Mentor
bullets: Mentor two students per cohort on programming fundamentals and simple full-stack projects; weekly video calls and code review.

volunteering.title: Tech Lead — Hackathon
bullets: Led a team of five in a 48-hour hackathon; coordinated tasks, set up repo and CI, and presented the demo; placed second overall.
